actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section  1814(b)(1) of the Social Security Act to provide reimbursement at reasonable cost for services furnished by certain public district hospitals.

summary.text: Amends Title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide reimbursement to public district hospitals which provide care to indigent patients in counties which do not have a county hospital for indigent care.

titles.title: A bill to amend section  1814(b)(1) of the Social Security Act to provide reimbursement at reasonable cost for services furnished by certain public district hospitals.
